summary: Frontend testing of Edit Estimate dialog completed successfully. All 8 requested features verified via Playwright automation on estimate EST-00062 (Draft status).

issues: React hydration warnings: '<thead> cannot be a child of <span>' - These are caused by development editor injecting wrapper spans, not production code issues

edit_dialog_opens_for_draft.description: Edit Estimate dialog opens when clicking Edit button on a Draft estimate (EST-00062). Dialog header shows 'Modify estimate details (only available for draft estimates)'

searchable_item_dropdown.description: Typing in item field shows matching items from inventory. Tested with 'serv' - shows '1st Free Service Altigreen-GO-25' with SKU and Rate displayed

new_item_button.description: '+ New Item' button present in Edit dialog header next to Item Table label. Opens inline item creation dialog

add_row_button.description: '+ Add Row' button present and functional. Clicking adds new empty row with placeholder 'Type or search item...'

discount_toggle.description: Discount column has dropdown toggle with '%' and '₹' options. Can switch between percentage and fixed amount discount types

tax_selection_dropdown.description: TAX column has dropdown with GST rates: 0%, 5%, 12%, 18%, 28%. Selection updates line item amount calculation

amount_calculation.description: AMOUNT column shows calculated total. Verified: changing tax from 18% to 12% updated amount from ₹2,360.00 to ₹2,240.00

save_changes_button.description: 'Save Changes' button (green, with data-testid='save-estimate-btn') present in dialog footer. 'Cancel' button also available

seed_data_creation: None - used existing Draft estimate EST-00062
context_for_next_testing_agent: Edit Estimate dialog now has full parity with New Estimate form. Features verified: searchable item dropdown with SKU/Rate display, + New Item for inline creation, + Add Row for adding line items, discount toggle (% vs ₹), tax dropdown (0-28% GST), real-time amount calculation, Save Changes functionality. All features working correctly on Draft estimates.
